00010 // Check against redundant including
00011 #ifndef TT_DCBLOCK_H
00012 #define TT_DCBLOCK_H
00013 
00014 // Include appropriate headers
00015 #include "tt_audio_base.h"
00016 
00017 
00018 /********************************************************
00019         CLASS INTERFACE/IMPLEMENTATION
00020 
00021         The entire class is implemented inline for speed.
00022  ********************************************************/
00023 
00024 class tt_dcblock:public tt_audio_base{
00025 
00026         private:
00027                 double          last_input1;
00028                 double          last_output1;
00029                 double          last_input2;
00030                 double          last_output2;
00031         
00032         public:
00033 
00034                 tt_dcblock()                            // Constructor          
00035                 {
00036                         clear();
00037                 }
00038 
00039                 ~tt_dcblock()                           // Destructor
00040                 {
00041                         ;
00042                 }
00043                 
00044                 
00045                 // DSP LOOP
00046                 // Note: an algorithm that is frequently used in Max:
00047                 //              "biquad~ 1.0 -1.0 -0.9997 0.0"
00048                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00049                 {
00050                         tt_sample_value temp;
00051                         int vs = in->vectorsize;                
00052 
00053                         while(vs--){
00054                                 temp = *in->vector++;
00055                                 *out->vector++ = last_output1 = anti_denormal(temp - last_input1 + (last_output1 * 0.9997));
00056                                 last_input1 = temp;
00057                         }
00058                         in->reset(); out->reset();
00059                 }
00060 
00061                 // DSP LOOP - STEREO
00062                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in1, tt_audio_signal *in2, 
00063                         tt_audio_signal *out1, tt_audio_signal *out2)
00064                 {
00065                         tt_sample_value temp1, temp2;
00066                         temp_vs = in1->vectorsize;              
00067 
00068                         while(temp_vs--){
00069                                 temp1 = *in1->vector++;
00070                                 temp2 = *in2->vector++;
00071                                 
00072                                 *out1->vector++ = last_output1 = anti_denormal(temp1 - last_input1 + (last_output1 * 0.9997));
00073                                 last_input1 = anti_denormal(temp1);
00074 
00075                                 *out2->vector++ = last_output2 = anti_denormal(temp2 - last_input2 + (last_output2 * 0.9997));
00076                                 last_input2 = anti_denormal(temp2);
00077                         }
00078                         in1->reset(); in2->reset(); out1->reset(); out2->reset();
00079                 }
00080 
00081 
00082                 // METHOD: clear
00083                 void clear()
00084                 {
00085                         last_input1 = 0.0;
00086                         last_output1 = 0.0;     
00087                         last_input2 = 0.0;
00088                         last_output2 = 0.0;     
00089                 }
00090 };
00091 
00092 #endif  // TT_DCBLOCK_H
